sixth_equipment: Electromagnetic valve for opening and closing
Работает по GSM, не требует Wi‑Fi или пр: Works via GSM, no Wi‑Fi or wires required
Не боится погружения в воду, работает в: Waterproof, works in wells and outdoors
Энергоэффективный – рассчитан на годы ра: Energy-efficient – designed for years of operation
Совместим с системами Smart City и любым: Compatible with Smart City systems and any software via API

Подходит для квартир, коттеджей, ЖК, ком: Suitable for apartments, cottages, residential complexes, commercial and municipal properties
Измерение_описание: The built-in measuring module calculates consumption; the data is displayed on the mechanical panel and stored in electronic memory
Сбор_описание: The electronic board regularly reads the data, checks for errors, and stores it. Before transmission, the data is encrypted for safety
Отправка_описание: The meter sends readings via GSM/GPRS to the service provider’s server on schedule. The user does not participate in this process
Обработка_описание: The utility company’s server receives the readings, links them to your personal account, and uses them to calculate charges
Контроль_описание: The meter reports its status: low battery, tampering attempts, or transmission errors
Получите_описание: Fill out the form and we will contact you
